attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although I think the UK Independence Party are a bit too right wing for my liking I think they have a point about the benefits of leaving the EEC on purely pragmatic grounds.  We are not getting value for money.  The cost is enormous and the money could be much better spent.  And if the EEC come up with any good ideas there is no reason why we can't copy them.
